strapiPost.title: Prominent Female Producer Creates Soundtrack for Momentary Exhibit
strapiPost.content:
Producer Jlin creates soundtrack for the Nick Cave: Until exhibit at The Momentary in Bentonville.

  • The well-known music producer created three immersive and "moody" tracks in response to the popular Nick Cave: Until exhibit at The Momentary, which addresses the topics of gender, race, and gun violence in the United States.
  • The exhibit remains on display at The Momentary until Jan 3. For more about Jlin and to listen to the tracks, click HERE.
